name: King Kaf
description:
What is a king without his kingdom ?  What is a people without memory ? 

Falling from the sky, a singular entity must reconstruct its memories by collecting gold leaves in order to reconnect with its ancestral roots. 

Going from region to region, it is only by going to meet the living beings of the remote lands of Lemuria that the Kingkaf people will regain the existence of the lost kingdom.

-- ABOUT THE AUTHORS --

Loïc Manglou

Versatile Artist and Game Designer since 2012.

Aleksand Cazal

Generalist 3D and 2D Artist since 2014.
